summary:
A small update to Falskaar to allow some the the Hearthfires content to spawn in Riften.
<br />
<br />Just load after Falskaar.
descriptionHtml:
Hearthfires added a number of locations in Riften for animations for children and adults added with the dlc, Falskaar overwrites these additions and reverts the area to vanilla. This means that some content from Hearthfires is removed from Riften if Falskaar is installed.

This is a very minor edit and should be placed after Falskaar in your mod order, or copied into a merged patch with TESVEdit. Doing so will save you from having to use an ESP for what is essentially a minor aesthetic bug fix.
author: Pronema
